I think about all the amazing Asian American women I've met in my cooking classes and dinner parties, and how passionate they are about food. My desire is to prove myself as a talented chef, not just because I'm good at making money, but because I genuinely enjoy sharing my passion for cooking with others. You love experimenting with flavors and creating unique dishes that leave a lasting impression on your guests.
